data.name: ROBOGAL-Adult Content
data.detailed_description:
Unlocks 18+ Adult Only Content for ROBOGAL.

All the characters are 18+.
The puzzle part of the game will be replaced with adult pictures.
When you collect a girl, you can enter the test room for testing.
Each girl has three kinds of test props. Using different props will play different animations.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512M
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
